titles.title: A concurrent resolution recognizing Doris "Granny D" Haddock, who inspired millions of people through remarkable acts of political activism, and extending the condolences of Congress on the death of Doris "Granny D" Haddock.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 4/19/2010--Introduced. Recognizes political activist Doris "Granny D" Haddock and extends condolences to her family.
